Text: Can someone pls seed.  Would very much appreciate it.  Thank you.
Hey, if you have season 4 uncut, could you please upload it? All the torrents I've found of it so far are dead.

Can someone pls upload. Most of us have about 3% left before download is complete.

I don't have season 4, im hoping someone will upload that one too.
I do have Season 4 uncut but it is scheduled for DVD release in the fall so I won't torrent them unless that doesn't happen.
thank you very much for reseeding, whoever it is.
Anony, could you please reseed season 4.  Im from UK and i can only buy from import here, but they are charging $100+ for each season.

The only reason S1-3 cost a lot is because they're out of print. Plus I haven't seen them go that high per season on eBay, or I would've sold mine already.

If the Lionsgate release happens you can import from Amazon.com at a price no higher than any other similar boxset.

Good news just announced today. Season 1-3 are being re-released on DVD by Lionsgate.

http://www.tvshowsondvd.com/news/Boy-Meets-World-Seasons-1-2-3/13908

This bodes well for the Season 4 release actually happening IMO.
